com.eyeball.utils.optionreading

Class PropertiesBasedOptionsReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eyeball.utils.optionreading.PropertiesBasedOptionsReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IOptionsReader

    public class PropertiesBasedOptionsReader
extends java.lang.Object
implements IOptionsReader
    An implementation of IOptionsReader to read regular files using java.util.Properties.
    Author:
    Eyeball
